token-bans.label: Token Ban Events
token-bans.description: Events related to token bans at the platform level

moderators.label: Moderator Events
moderators.description: Events for moderator management and role changes

trades.label: Trade Events
trades.description: Events for executed trades and bonding curve operations

pool-metadata.label: Pool Metadata Events
pool-metadata.description: Events for pool information and badge updates

holders.label: Holder Count Events
holders.description: Events for token holder count changes

comments.label: Comment Events
comments.description: Events for pool comments and discussions

TOKEN_BANNED.name: TOKEN_BANNED
TOKEN_BANNED.description: Emitted when a token is globally banned (overseer action). Broadcast to overseer room.

fields.name: tokenName
fields.description: Token name that was banned

fields.name: reason
fields.description: Optional reason for the ban

fields.name: bannedBy
fields.description: Address of the overseer who performed the ban

fields.name: bannedAt
fields.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the ban occurred

TOKEN_UNBANNED.name: TOKEN_UNBANNED
TOKEN_UNBANNED.description: Emitted when a token ban is lifted. Broadcast to overseer room.

fields.name: tokenName
fields.description: Token name that was unbanned

fields.name: unbannedBy
fields.description: Address of the overseer who lifted the ban

MODERATOR_ADDED.name: MODERATOR_ADDED
MODERATOR_ADDED.description: Emitted when a user is added as a moderator for a token. Broadcast to token room.

fields.name: tokenName
fields.description: Token name for which the user became a moderator

fields.name: userAddress
fields.description: Wallet address of the new moderator

fields.name: role
fields.description: ModeratorRole enum value (MODERATOR, TECHNICAL_PRODUCER, MANAGER, OWNER)

fields.name: invitedBy
fields.description: Address of the user who invited this moderator

fields.name: addedAt
fields.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the moderator was added

fields.name: user
fields.description: Optional user profile information

MODERATOR_REMOVED.name: MODERATOR_REMOVED
MODERATOR_REMOVED.description: Emitted when a moderator is removed from a token. Broadcast to token room.

fields.name: tokenName
fields.description: Token name from which the user was removed

fields.name: userAddress
fields.description: Wallet address of the removed moderator

fields.name: removedBy
fields.description: Address of the user who removed this moderator

MODERATOR_ROLE_UPDATED.name: MODERATOR_ROLE_UPDATED
MODERATOR_ROLE_UPDATED.description: Emitted when a moderator's role is updated (promoted/demoted). Broadcast to token room.

fields.name: tokenName
fields.description: Token name for which the role was updated

fields.name: userAddress
fields.description: Wallet address of the moderator

fields.name: oldRole
fields.description: Previous ModeratorRole enum value

fields.name: newRole
fields.description: New ModeratorRole enum value

fields.name: updatedBy
fields.description: Address of the user who updated the role

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the role was updated

OVERSEER_ADDED.name: OVERSEER_ADDED
OVERSEER_ADDED.description: Emitted when a user becomes an overseer (system administrator). Broadcast to overseer room + global announcement.

fields.name: userAddress
fields.description: Wallet address of the new overseer

fields.name: addedBy
fields.description: Optional address of the user who added this overseer

fields.name: fullName
fields.description: Optional full name of the new overseer

fields.name: profileImage
fields.description: Optional profile image URL of the new overseer

fields.name: addedAt
fields.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the overseer was added

OVERSEER_REMOVED.name: OVERSEER_REMOVED
OVERSEER_REMOVED.description: Emitted when overseer privileges are revoked from a user. Broadcast to overseer room.

fields.name: userAddress
fields.description: Wallet address of the removed overseer

fields.name: removedBy
fields.description: Optional address of the user who removed this overseer

fields.name: removedAt
fields.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the overseer was removed

TRADE_EXECUTED.name: TRADE_EXECUTED
TRADE_EXECUTED.description: Emitted when a trade is executed on a bonding curve (buy/sell). Broadcast to token room. High-frequency event - may be throttled (1 per second per token).

fields.name: tokenName
fields.description: Token name for which the trade occurred

fields.name: txnId
fields.description: Optional transaction ID

fields.name: tradeType
fields.description: Trade type: BUY or SELL

fields.name: userAddress
fields.description: Wallet address of the trader

fields.name: inputAmount
fields.description: Amount of input currency

fields.name: outputAmount
fields.description: Amount of output currency

fields.name: newPrice
fields.description: Optional new token price after the trade

fields.name: newMarketCap
fields.description: Optional new market cap after the trade

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the trade occurred

POOL_METADATA_UPDATED.name: POOL_METADATA_UPDATED
POOL_METADATA_UPDATED.description: Emitted when pool metadata is updated (generic update). Broadcast to token room.

fields.name: tokenName
fields.description: Token name for which metadata was updated

fields.name: field
fields.description: Optional field name that was updated

fields.name: value
fields.description: Optional new value of the updated field

fields.name: updatedBy
fields.description: Optional address of the user who updated metadata

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the update occurred

POOL_SOCIAL_LINKS_UPDATED.name: POOL_SOCIAL_LINKS_UPDATED
POOL_SOCIAL_LINKS_UPDATED.description: Emitted when pool social links are updated. Broadcast to token room.

fields.name: tokenName
fields.description: Token name for which social links were updated

fields.name: websiteUrl
fields.description: Optional website URL

fields.name: twitterUrl
fields.description: Optional Twitter/X URL

fields.name: telegramUrl
fields.description: Optional Telegram URL

fields.name: instagramUrl
fields.description: Optional Instagram URL

fields.name: facebookUrl
fields.description: Optional Facebook URL

fields.name: discordUrl
fields.description: Optional Discord URL

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the update occurred

POOL_BADGE_ASSIGNED.name: POOL_BADGE_ASSIGNED
POOL_BADGE_ASSIGNED.description: Emitted when a badge is assigned to a pool. Broadcast to token room.

fields.name: tokenName
fields.description: Token name to which the badge was assigned

fields.name: badgeType
fields.description: Badge type (e.g., 'volume', 'engagement', 'market_cap')

fields.name: badge
fields.description: Badge name/identifier

fields.name: assignedAt
fields.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the badge was assigned

HOLDER_COUNT_UPDATED.name: HOLDER_COUNT_UPDATED
HOLDER_COUNT_UPDATED.description: Emitted when the holder count for a token changes. Usually triggered by trade execution. Broadcast to token room.

fields.name: tokenName
fields.description: Token name for which holder count changed

fields.name: holderCount
fields.description: Current number of token holders

fields.name: previousCount
fields.description: Optional previous number of token holders

fields.name: change
fields.description: Optional change in holder count (difference)

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the update occurred

COMMENT_CREATED.name: COMMENT_CREATED
COMMENT_CREATED.description: Emitted when a new comment is posted on a pool. Broadcast to comment room. Note: Update and delete events already exist via PoolMessageService.

fields.name: tokenName
fields.description: Token name on which the comment was posted

fields.name: id
fields.description: MySQL auto-increment ID of the comment

fields.name: messageId
fields.description: Optional UUID-based string ID

fields.name: content
fields.description: Comment text content

fields.name: userAddress
fields.description: Wallet address of the comment author

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the comment was created

fields.name: user
fields.description: Optional user profile information

USER_PROFILE_UPDATED.name: USER_PROFILE_UPDATED
USER_PROFILE_UPDATED.description: Emitted when a user updates their profile (name, image, bio, badges). Broadcast to user-specific room (user:{address}). Global impact - user appears in many contexts.

fields.name: userAddress
fields.description: Wallet address of the user whose profile was updated

fields.name: updatedFields
fields.description: List of field names that were updated (e.g., ['fullName', 'profileImage', 'bio'])

fields.name: updates
fields.type: { fullName?: string; profileImage?: string; bio?: string; badges?: string[] }
fields.description: Optional object containing the updated field values

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the update occurred

API_KEY_CREATED.name: API_KEY_CREATED
API_KEY_CREATED.description: Emitted when an API key is created. Broadcast to user-specific room (user:{address}) - private to owner.

fields.name: tokenName
fields.description: Optional token name associated with the API key

fields.name: keyId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the API key

fields.name: keyPrefix
fields.description: Optional prefix/display portion of the API key

fields.name: name
fields.description: Optional friendly name for the API key

fields.name: description
fields.description: Optional description of the API key's purpose

fields.name: permissions
fields.description: Optional list of permissions granted to this API key

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the API key was created

API_KEY_UPDATED.name: API_KEY_UPDATED
API_KEY_UPDATED.description: Emitted when an API key settings are updated. Broadcast to user-specific room (user:{address}) - private to owner.

fields.name: tokenName
fields.description: Optional token name associated with the API key

fields.name: keyId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the API key

fields.name: keyPrefix
fields.description: Optional prefix/display portion of the API key

fields.name: updatedFields
fields.description: Optional list of field names that were updated

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the update occurred

API_KEY_REVOKED.name: API_KEY_REVOKED
API_KEY_REVOKED.description: Emitted when an API key is revoked/deleted. Broadcast to user-specific room (user:{address}) - private to owner.

fields.name: tokenName
fields.description: Optional token name associated with the API key

fields.name: keyId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the API key

fields.name: keyPrefix
fields.description: Optional prefix/display portion of the API key

fields.name: revokedBy
fields.description: Optional address of the user who revoked the API key

fields.name: revokedAt
fields.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the API key was revoked
